author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 29-year-old woman, P. Divya, lost her gold chain when the family members failed to lock the grille gate and left the wooden door ajar for ventilation in her house near Usilampatti in the small hours of Wednesday.

The police said that the family of Prabhu was sleeping in their house in Karuthaveeranpatti without locking the grille gate.

They had kept the wooden door open for ventilation.

A robber, sporting a pair of half trousers, stealthily entered the house around 3.15 a.m., snatched Divya’s five-sovereign gold chain and fled the scene.

Chase in vain

The family members chased him on hearing the alarm from the woman, but in vain.

Usilampatti Taluk police are investigating.
title: Woman relieved of chain
